page.title: 07The Old Village Hall.
page.content: The old village hall was used for its final public use as a polling station on May 9th 1985. There was sufficient boarded floor left for the polling booths and clerks tables.There were over five thousand nails in the maple floorboards that were lifted. Villagers raised over{Â£11,000}towards the cost of the hall through their own fund raising efforts over the last few years. When the hall is finished the new hall will have cost around{ {Â£74,000. The old Hall was finally demolished on the weekend of June 1st 1985 and all that remains as this is being written is a pile of rubble and a brand new,almost completed hall standing just behind the site of the old one.
